survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Autonomous Grocery Checkout Systems Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather customer feedback on the usability, satisfaction, and areas for improvement regarding autonomous grocery checkout systems.

questions.question_text: How often do you use autonomous grocery checkout systems?
questions.client_notes: This question helps determine frequency of use, which may correlate with satisfaction levels.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format.

script.question_text: How often do you use autonomous grocery checkout systems?

questions.question_text: What is your overall satisfaction with autonomous grocery checkout systems?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who answered 'Every time I shop', 'Frequently', or 'Occasionally' to Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format.

script.question_text: What is your overall satisfaction with autonomous grocery checkout systems?
script.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who answered 'Every time I shop', 'Frequently', or 'Occasionally' to Q1.

questions.question_text: What do you like most about autonomous grocery checkout systems?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who answered 'Very satisfied' or 'Satisfied' to Q2.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture positive experiences.

script.question_text: What do you like most about autonomous grocery checkout systems?
script.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who answered 'Very satisfied' or 'Satisfied' to Q2.

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced when using autonomous grocery checkout systems?
answer_options: Technical issues (e.g., system errors, scanning problems)
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who answered 'Neutral', 'Dissatisfied', or 'Very dissatisfied' to Q2.
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify common pain points.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format with an 'Other' option.

script.question_text: What challenges have you faced when using autonomous grocery checkout systems?
answer_options: Technical issues (e.g., system errors, scanning problems)
script.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who answered 'Neutral', 'Dissatisfied', or 'Very dissatisfied' to Q2.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend autonomous grocery checkout systems to others?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who answered Q2.
questions.client_notes: This question measures Net Promoter Score (NPS) potential.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend autonomous grocery checkout systems to others?
script.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who answered Q2.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for autonomous grocery checkout systems?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather actionable feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for autonomous grocery checkout systems?
